skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 100% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn, and a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns, if this Champion's current HP is higher than the target's current HP.
